name: fenix-web
description: Torchlight Infinite Inventory Tracker - Web Version

scripts.prod: npm run build && powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "if (Test-Path .\docs) { Remove-Item .\docs -Recurse -Force }; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path .\docs | Out-Null; Copy-Item dist\* .\docs -Recurse -Force; New-Item -ItemType File -Path .\docs\.nojekyll -Force | Out-Null"

author: Syncingoutt
